Name: BitBattle
About the game: BitBattle is a 2D multiplayer action shooter. Run, Shoot, Jump and Shoot again! What counts is your reaction time and your skill. Play on diffrent maps against friends or other players! Zero Aim, 100% Bullet Hell! Collect weapons and items to make your opponent's life even worse. There is more! Go on a race! Shooter with races? YES! Why not. Race against friends or other players and win! Features Multiplayer up to 8 Players Play offline 1vs1 on your Computer / Remote play Together Skins and effects Diffrent Maps Diffrent Weapons Diffrent Items Diffrent Game Modes
